title: 15 mins delay on NSL due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: NSL 因轨道故障延误15分钟
title_translations.ms: 15 minit kelewatan di NSL disebabkan oleh kerosakan landasan
title_translations.ta: தடக் கோளாறு காரணமாக NSL இல் 15 நிமிடங்கள் தாமதம்

updates.text: [NSL]: Dear commuters, free regular bus services have ceased. Normal trains services have resumed. We are sorry to affect your commute.
Dear commuters, normal train services have resumed. Free regular bus services are still available.
[NSL]: Due to a track fault, please add 15mins travel time from #ToaPayoh to #Bishan towards #JurongEast. Free regular buses are available between #ToaPayoh and #Bishan.

[NSL]: Due to a track fault, please add 15mins train travel time from #ToaPayoh to #Bishan towards #JurongEast. Free regular buses are available between #ToaPayoh and #Bishan. Please look out for fellow commuters with special needs and lend a helping hand. We are sorry for

[NSL]: Due to a track fault, please add 15mins train travel time from #ToaPayoh to #Bishan towards #JurongEast. Free regular bus is available between #ToaPayoh and #Bishan. (Refer to Diagram 1) https://t.co/D8KyFyL3iA
[NSL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time from #ToaPayoh to #Bishan towards #JurongEast. Free regular bus is available between #ToaPayoh and #Bishan.
